changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS post ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, content TEXT NOT NULL, status ENUM('ACTIVE', 'UNDER_REVIEW', 'DELETED') NOT NULL, created DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, writer_id BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_post_writer FOREIGN KEY (writer_id) REFERENCES writer(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
